member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin
member.summary: Represents a plugin that can be used to automatically intialize the smooth streaming SDK.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of AdaptivePlugin.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.UpdateQuality
member.summary: Called when the selected video track has changed. Used to update the signal strength and media quality properties on the MediaPlayer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.AutoRestrictSize
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to automatically prevent video tracks greater than the size of the player from ever being chosen.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.MaxBitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum bitrate that can be used for video. This is useful for limiting the bitrate under metered network situations. Note: additional tracks will also be unselected based on the size of the player if AutoRestrictSize = false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.MinBitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets the Minimum bitrate that can be used for video. This is useful for limiting the bitrate so quality never dips below a certain amount. Note: additional tracks will also be unselected based on the size of the player if AutoRestrictSize = false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.StartupBitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets the startup bitrate to be used. This is useful for starting at a higher quality when you know the user has a good connection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.AutoSchemeDownloaderPlugin
member.summary: Gets or sets whether media URL schemes should automatically use the custom scheme 'ms-sstr:' in order to automatically invoke the DownloaderPlugin. Default true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.Manager
member.summary: Gets the instance of the WinRT AdaptiveStreamingManager class used to communicate with the Smooth Streaming SDK.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.ByteStreamHandlers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of byte stream handlers that should be registered with the MediaExtensionManager for the Smooth Streaming SDK.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.InstreamCaptionsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether in-stream text tracks should be used as captions. Default = false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.SchemeHandlers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of scheme handlers that should be registered with the MediaExtensionManager for the Smooth Streaming SDK.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Adaptive.AdaptivePlugin.DownloaderPlugin
member.summary: Gets or set the DownloaderPlugin to be used. This is a class that allows you to intercept each request to the Smooth Streaming SDK before it tries to process the data.
